DOC.brief_summary: This randomise , open-label phase II study compare GEM-P chemotherapy ( experimental arm ) CHOP ( control arm ) previously untreated T-cell lymphoma . Eligible patient randomise 1:1 4-weekly GEM-P 3-weekly CHOP chemotherapy .
